UnitDefinition.Name: Internal model type
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted internal model types. PBK model or conversion factor model.

Unit.Name: Use kinetic conversion factors
Unit.Description: Use a low-tier model that uses constant conversion factors read form a data source.

Unit.Name: Use PBK models with fallback on kinetic conversion factors
Unit.Description: Use PBK models with fallback on kinetic conversion factors (internal concentrations).
